name: resin-electronjs-piscreen
description: A resin.io app for raspberry pi that streams the [live ustream video feed](http://www.ustream.tv/channel/iss-hdev-payload) from NASA's [High Definition Earth-Viewing System](https://eol.jsc.nasa.gov/ESRS/HDEV/) payload on the ISS.

scripts.start: forever start -o out.log -e err.log -f --spinSleepTime 500 kijani-poller.js; forever logs kijani-poller.js -f
